long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Game Site Monitor helps you track new games and gaming content across multiple gaming websites. It provides an efficient way to discover new games and analyze their popularity trends.

Key Features:
- Monitor multiple game websites simultaneously
- Automatic game name extraction
- Compare game trends with GPTs on Google Trends
- Quick search links to Google, Reddit, and Twitter
- Customizable monitoring schedule
- Export results to CSV
- Group results by website
- Real-time monitoring logs

How it works:
1. Enter your target gaming websites
2. Select time range for content monitoring
3. Set up automatic check intervals
4. Get notifications when it's time to check for updates
5. View and analyze results with integrated trend analysis
6. Export data for further analysis

Perfect for:
- Game developers
- Gaming content creators
- Game industry analysts
- Gaming enthusiasts
- Market researchers

Privacy & Permissions:
- Requires access to Google search for monitoring
- No personal data collection
- All settings stored locally
- Optional desktop notifications
